title: how could this happen ??
body:
i was bronze 5 and entered the promos i won it , i became bronze 4 , what the hell ???????
what can i do people ???

replies.body:
Winning a Promo series in One Tier (Bronze V) will move you to the next tier (Bronze IV). The higher tier you're at, the lower the number, therefore, the highest tier in Bronze is Bronze I. You can find out how the ranked system works inside our [**Ranked Play FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
